Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to <GREEN>Camellia Travel</GREEN>!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where do you want to travel to?
Southern Island Getaway!
Polar Expedition to Snowland!
Explore the Land of the East!
Romance of the Ancient Ruins!
Nowhere.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come again!
Travel adventures await you!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm afraid to say, you're too late to
depart for that destination...
Perhaps some other trip?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You will arrive at <RED><MOJI0>:<MOJI1> <MOJI2></RED>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That trip costs <BLUE><MOJI0>G</BLUE>.
I'll go!
I'll pass.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're not going?
What a shame!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well well, so you don't have enough to
pay for the trip? Save up and come back!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll make the arrangements and you can
depart straight away!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't traveling by air a breeze?
<PAGE>
Now you have <MOJI0> hours to spend here!
Enjoy!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will anyone be joining you on this trip?
Just me
My spouse is coming too
It's a family trip
Never mind

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, I'm sure your husband Allen is so
busy with his salon, he can't get away.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, I'm sure your husband Rod is so busy
running his pet shop he can't get away.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sure your husband Neil is so busy
with his animal store he can't get away.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sure your wife Yuri is so busy
running her shop, she can't get away.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sure your wife Felicity is busy with
her part-time job and can't get away.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Isn't your wife sick in bed?
Now's not the time to be taking a trip!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Isn't your husband sick in bed?
Now's not the time to be taking a trip!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want to go to <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>?
The fee for that trip would be <BLUE><MOJI1>G</BLUE>,
up front.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you'll call <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> to join you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip for just the two of us?
Fabulous, I wouldn't miss it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Go on a trip, huh?
That sound like fun!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip, is it?
I welcome the idea!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You will take me on a trip?
How delightful!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Trip, huh?
Sure, why not?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip for two...
Sounds delightful.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh wow, <MYNAME>, a TRIP!
I just LOVE that idea!♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee, a trip for just the two of us!
I can't wait!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A........ trip.
How......... nice.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip?
Where will we go? How exciting.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip as a couple.
Sounds scrumptious!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very well, <MYNAME>!
The Witch Princess will accompany you!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't your child sick in bed?
Now's not the time to be taking a trip!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it's a family vacation...
The fee for that trip would be <BLUE><MOJI0>G</BLUE>,
up front.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you'll call <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE> and <BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE>
to join you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A family trip?
Fabulous, I wouldn't miss it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Go on a family trip, huh?
Sure, that sound like fun!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A family trip, is it?
I welcome the idea!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'll take our little family on a trip?
How delightful!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Family trip, huh?
Sure, why not?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip for our family...
Sounds delightful.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh wow, <MYNAME>, a FAMILY TRIP!
I just LOVE that idea!♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tee-hee, a trip for our family together!
I can't wait!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A........ family...... trip.
How......... nice.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip? All three of us?
Where will we go? How exciting.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A trip as a family.
Sounds scrumptious!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very well, <MYNAME>!
The Witch Princess will accompany you
on this family vacation!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay, a trip!
Where, where? Yippee!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whee, a trip!
Where, where? Yippee!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cool, a trip!
Where? I want to have some fun!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ooh, a trip!
Where? I want to have some fun!
